feed.title: Google Cloud: Sensitive Data Protection
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Sensitive Data Protection

entry.title: Feature
entry.content:
Sensitive Data Protection can detect and redact the following object infoTypes in images:
* `OBJECT_TYPE/BARCODE` * `OBJECT_TYPE/LICENSE_PLATE` * `OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON` * `OBJECT_TYPE/WHITEBOARD`
For more information, see the following:
* [Inspect an image for sensitive objects](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/inspecting-images#inspect_an_image_for_sensitive_objects) * [Object redaction](https://cloud.google.com/sensitive-data-protection/docs/redacting-sensitive-data-images#object-redaction)

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: The `CZECHIA_PERSONAL_ID_NUMBER` infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see [InfoType detector reference](https://cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/infotypes-reference).
